pulses.name: Candle
pulses.prompt: Name one feeling. Hold gentle gaze. Laugh softly.

pulses.name: Body Rhythm
pulses.prompt: Balance walk. Group clap stabilizes wobble.

pulses.name: Mind Song
pulses.prompt: Read two lines aloud. Ask: what did your body notice?

pulses.name: Seal
pulses.prompt: One learning, one release. Lights together.
